update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

url.title: URL
url.description: The base URL of the ActiveMQ [Web Console](https://activemq.apache.org/components/classic/documentation/web-console).

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: The timeout in seconds for the HTTP request.

not_follow_redirects.title: Not follow redirects
not_follow_redirects.description: If set, the client will not follow HTTP redirects automatically.

max_queues.title: Queue limit
max_queues.description: The maximum number of concurrently collected queues. Set to 0 for no limit.

queues_filter.title: Queue selector
queues_filter.description: Collect queues whose names match the specified [pattern](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/libnetdata/simple_pattern#readme).

max_topics.title: Topic limit
max_topics.description: The maximum number of concurrently collected topics. Set to 0 for no limit.

topics_filter.title: Topic selector
topics_filter.description: Collect topics whose names match the specified [pattern](https://github.com/netdata/netdata/tree/master/src/libnetdata/simple_pattern#readme).

proxy_url.title: Proxy URL
proxy_url.description: The URL of the proxy server.

headers.title: Headers
headers.description: Additional HTTP headers to include in the request.

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).

queues_filter.ui:help: Use `*` to collect all queues. To exclude all queues from collection, use `!*`.

topics_filter.ui:help: Use `*` to collect all topics. To exclude all topics from collection, use `!*`.
